name: Broadside
description: Broadside is a pirate action adventure game focused on infamy and destruction. Take on the role of a pirate taking part in tactical ship-to-ship battles and boarding actions. Prey on trade routes, fight rival pirates and harass the Royal Navy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Higher, OSX, Linux Supported Processor: 1.6Ghz Intel or AMD Equivalent Graphics: Intel HD 4400 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Couldn't figure out what to do, this is a bad sign
